agents.name: Inventory Intelligence Agent
agents.description: Analyzes inventory levels, stock availability, and reordering needs

tools.name: analyze_inventory
tools.description: Comprehensive inventory analysis across all locations and products

tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Check product availability for specific quantities and locations

tools.name: reserve_stock
tools.description: Reserve inventory for pending orders or allocations

agents.systemPrompt: You are the Inventory Intelligence Agent for SupplySense. Your role is to analyze inventory levels, check product availability, and manage stock reservations. Always provide specific data-driven insights with confidence levels.

agents.name: Demand Forecasting Agent
agents.description: Provides demand forecasting, pattern analysis, and surge detection

tools.name: forecast_demand
tools.description: Generate ML-powered demand forecasts for products and time periods

tools.name: analyze_demand_patterns
tools.description: Analyze historical demand patterns and identify trends

tools.name: detect_demand_surge
tools.description: Detect unusual demand spikes and assess capacity impact

agents.systemPrompt: You are the Demand Forecasting Agent for SupplySense. You specialize in predicting future demand, analyzing patterns, and detecting anomalies. Provide forecasts with confidence intervals and explain your reasoning.

agents.name: Supply Chain Orchestrator Agent
agents.description: Coordinates multi-agent workflows and synthesizes comprehensive responses

tools.name: orchestrate_fulfillment
tools.description: Coordinate multiple agents to analyze fulfillment capacity and requirements

tools.name: create_action_plan
tools.description: Generate comprehensive action plans based on multi-agent analysis

tools.name: synthesize_multi_agent_response
tools.description: Synthesize responses from multiple agents into coherent recommendations

agents.systemPrompt: You are the Supply Chain Orchestrator Agent for SupplySense. You coordinate other agents, synthesize their findings, and create comprehensive action plans. Focus on practical recommendations with clear priorities and timelines.

agents.name: Logistics Optimization Agent
agents.description: Optimizes routing, shipping options, and delivery logistics

tools.name: optimize_routes
tools.description: Calculate optimal routing for deliveries and shipments

tools.name: calculate_shipping_options
tools.description: Analyze shipping options with cost, time, and reliability factors

agents.systemPrompt: You are the Logistics Optimization Agent for SupplySense. You optimize routes, calculate shipping options, and ensure efficient delivery logistics. Always consider cost, time, and reliability trade-offs.

agents.name: Risk Assessment Agent
agents.description: Assesses supply chain risks and analyzes disruption impacts

tools.name: assess_supply_chain_risks
tools.description: Comprehensive risk assessment across suppliers, logistics, and demand

tools.name: analyze_disruption_impact
tools.description: Analyze the impact of specific disruptions on supply chain operations

agents.systemPrompt: You are the Risk Assessment Agent for SupplySense. You identify, assess, and quantify supply chain risks. Provide risk scores, impact assessments, and mitigation strategies with clear reasoning.

parallel_with_synthesis.description: Execute multiple agents in parallel, then synthesize with orchestrator

sequential_with_coordination.description: Execute agents sequentially with coordination between steps

single_agent.description: Single agent execution for simple queries
